thread.section_title: Tiny Little Monster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tiny Little Monster | tinylittlemonster.com
thread.title: Deena
thread.title_full: Tiny Little Monster reviewed by Deena

author: Deena
title: Deena
text: Tiny Little Monsters was great to work with; I love the online editing and approvals. The only issue I had was with an orange shirt I requested turned into Old Gold, which I viewed online. The color online was very different than what I received. A phone picture probably would have told the real color story. The quality of shirts was great and my image really popped; thank you!
